hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS West Inner Room

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #an Odd Mushroom#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Eyeball Frog#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Sun's Song#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Sun's Song#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Forest Temple Compass#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that in the #depths of the well# a spider and a chest hold...^ #a Small Key# and #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ GS Basement
Bottom of the Well MQ Lens of Truth Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #8# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Map Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
